title: A RESOLUTION AUTHORIZING THE MUNICIPAL GOVERNMENT OF LOS BANOS (MGLB) THROUGH THE LOCAL CHIEF EXECUTIVE, HONORABLE MAYOR NEIL ANDREW N. NOCON TO ENTER INTO A MEMORANDUM OF AGREEMENT (MOA) WITH LOS BANOS DOCTORS HOSPITAL AND MEDICAL CENTER LOCATED AT BARANGAY BATONG MALAKE, LOS BANOS, LAGUNA, FOR THE PROPER AND SAFE DISPOSAL OF INFECTIOUS WASTES GENERATED DURING THE OPERATION OF THE MUNICIPAL HEALTH FACILITIES.
